name: Last light (Kaldrin)
description:
Hey you !

Last light is a dynamic and neon-styled top-down-shooter where you'll have to progress in the level by killing the enemy robots to reach the end using multiple weapons !

I created it during my first year of game design degree using Unity ^^

And it was fun to make !

We had to create a top-down-shooter game with multiple levels, power-ups and enemies, by groups of 2 !

The music isn't from me, credits to Madeon.

Concept

This is a nervous flow shooter where you'll be driven by the music to travel the neon city to reach and destroy its core with your neon tank !

Shoot your enemies and pick up different weapons to gain health and get rid of them !

Commands

- Shift : Dash

- Mouse : Aim

- ZQSD : Move

Bugs

- If you take a raising platform, don't fall off it, it won't come back to pick you up.
